---
title: "students"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
students <- read_csv(here::here("00_admin", "gradebook_export-CMB.710D.01.F19.csv"), skip = 1, col_names = FALSE) %>% 
  rename(email = "X1", last_name = "X2") %>% 
  separate(last_name, into = c("last_name", "first_name"), sep = ",", remove = TRUE)

funs <- c("pivot_wider", "filter", "mutate", "select", "summarize", "count", "group_by", "arrange", "separate()", "unite", "x_join()", "read_x (csv, tsv, etc)", "write_x (csv, tsv, etc) ", "bind_rows/cols", "rename()", "tibble()", "geom_point", "labs+", "theme_x()", "ggsave()")

students <- students %>% 
  mutate(fun = funs)
```
